metadata.title: Somali
metadata.summary: BBC Somali waxa aad ka heleysaa wararkii ugu dambeeyay ee Soomaalida iyo caalamkaba.

headlines.headline: Ciidamada Kenya oo dilay 20 qof oo ah Dagaalyahano Soomaaliya

items.summary: Iska hor imaadkan ayaa yimi kadib markii ay ciidamada kenya dariiq ay adeegsanayeen ay u galeen kooxda all-shabaab

headlines.headline: At least 4 people have been killed in Somalia last two days

items.summary: The conflict between Shabab and Somali military started last hours in Thursday evening .

headlines.headline: Flim jacayl ah oo ay wada jilayaan dad kala diin duwan

items.summary: Flim jacayl ah oo ay wada jilayaan wiil uu imaam soomaali ah dhalay iyo gabar uu baadaari dhalay.

headlines.headline: US strike kills 24 jihadist in Somalia

items.summary: The US military said on Thursday it had killed 24 militants in an air strike

indexImage.caption: Al-Shabab fighters outside Mogadishu, Somalia, in 2011. Photograph: Mohamed Sheikh Nor/AP

headlines.headline: Daanyeer wiil yar ka dafay dhabta hooyadii kadibna dilay

items.summary: Wiil yar oo 12 maalmood jira ayaa ku dhintay isbitaal ku yaalo Hindiya kadib markii uu daanyeer hooyadiis ka dafay uuna maalin cadeey khaarijiyay

headlines.headline: Maalintii 3d ee Shirka Guddiga Amniga

items.summary: Waxaa maalintii sedexaad galay shirka guddiga amniga qaranka Soomaaliya, iyada oo wararka soo baxaa ay sheegayaan is mari waa ku saabsan qodobada qaarkood, gaar ahaan qodobka ku saabsan qoondada ciidamada ee maamul goboleedyada.

headlines.headline: Angolan ex-leaders son acused of fraud

items.summary: Angola's ex-President José Eduardo dos Santos son has been formally accused of fraud

indexImage.altText: osé Filomeno dos Santos was removed as head of a $5bn wealth fund this year
indexImage.caption: Jose Filomeno Dos Santos speaking to BBC News in 2012

headlines.headline: The drug-smuggling fishermen vowing to clear their name

items.summary: Six years ago, a group of fishermen were convicted for their role in one of the biggest drug smuggling hauls in British history.

indexImage.altText: A fishing boat on the dock
indexImage.caption: The men's fishing boat, the Galwad, has not seen the sea for years

imageThumbnail.altText: A fishing boat on the dock
imageThumbnail.caption: The men's fishing boat, the Galwad, has not seen the sea for years

headlines.headline: Russian shopping centre fire kills 64

items.summary: Over 60 people have died in a fire at a shopping and entertainment complex in the Siberian coal-mining city of Kemerovo.

indexImage.altText: Firefighters tackle fatal shopping centre fire in the Russian city of Kemerovo
indexImage.caption: Komerovo lies some 3600 kilometres from the Russia capital- Moscow

headlines.headline: Ciidammada Gabon oo weerraray mucaaradka

items.summary: Iska hor imaad ayaa ka dhacay Gabon, kadib markii madaxweynaha xilka haya Cali Bongo lagu dhawaaqay inuu ku guulaystay doorashada in ka yar lix kun oo cod.

indexImage.altText: Madaxweyne Kibaki oo karoonka Nyayo ka hadlay
indexImage.caption: Kibaki

headlines.headline: Baarlamaanka Gabon oo la gubay

items.summary: Gabonese security forces have stormed the headquarters of the defeated presidential candidate, Jean Ping, as unrest continues after Saturday's disputed election.

headlines.headline: Twigg considers teacher debt plan major update

items.summary: High-flying students could have part of their tuition fees paid off in exchange for becoming teachers in deprived areas if Labour wins the next election.

byline.name: By Brian Wheeler
byline.title: Political reporter, BBC News, in Manchester

headlines.headline: Ruushka oo diyaarad looga soo riday Suuriya

items.summary: Wasaaradda difaaca ee dalka Ruushka, ayaa sheegtay in shan qof ay saarnaayeen diyaaradaasi markii ay ku soo dhacday gobalka Idlib.

headlines.headline: Laba biladood oo dahab ah oo Britain ay qaadatay

items.summary: South Africa to hold Local Elections which will determine whether the ANC will still be in power

headlines.headline: Cancer: Thousands surviving in UK decades after diagnosis

items.summary: More than 170,000 people in the UK who were diagnosed with cancer up to 40 years ago are still alive, a report by Macmillan Cancer Support has suggested

indexImage.altText: A child with cancer in the UK
indexImage.caption: Cancer patients get hope

imageThumbnail.altText: A child with cancer in the UK
imageThumbnail.caption: Cancer patients get hope

headlines.headline: Concerns over Malaysia's new security law

items.summary: A new security law giving Malaysia's prime minister sweeping new powers has prompted concern it could restrict rights and stifle democracy.

indexImage.caption: The new security laws raise concern over rights

imageThumbnail.caption: The new security laws raise concern over rights

headlines.headline: What's the point of testimonials ?

items.summary: Wayne Rooney is marking 12 years at Manchester United with a testimonial match against his former club Everton. But, considering the traditional aim of testimonials has been to raise much-needed money for players as they leave the game, why do we still need them in the era of multi-millionaire footballers?

indexImage.caption: Wayne Rooney praying for more money?

imageThumbnail.caption: Wayne Rooney praying for more money?

headlines.headline: Erdogan 'snatch squad' fugitives held

items.summary: Turkey says it has captured all but one of the soldiers who are accused of trying to seize the president during the failed coup.

indexImage.altText: One of the arrested men was identified as Captain Mustafa Serdar Ozay
indexImage.caption: One of the arrested men was identified as Captain Mustafa Serdar Ozay

imageThumbnail.altText: One of the arrested men was identified as Captain Mustafa Serdar Ozay
imageThumbnail.caption: One of the arrested men was identified as Captain Mustafa Serdar Ozay

headlines.headline: Row over Cameron's alleged honours list

items.summary: Opposition MPs have called for a complete overhaul of the honours system after a newspaper published what it said were leaked details of David Cameron's resignation honours list.

headlines.headline: Doorashada Madaxweynaha oo dib loo dhigay

items.summary: Guddiga doorashooyinka ee Soomaaliya ayaa sheegay in dib loo dhigay doorashada madaxtinimada ilaa bisha Disembar.

indexImage.altText: Guddiga doorashada ayaa tartanka madaxweyninamada dib u dhigay ilaa bisha Disembar
indexImage.caption: Guddiga doorashada

headlines.headline: Erdogan oo eedeeyay sarkaal Amerikan ah

items.summary: Madaxweyne Erdogan-ka dalka Turkiga ayaa sarkaal sare oo ka mid ah militariga Mareykanka ku eedeeyay inuu la jiro dadkii isku deyay inay dowladda afgembiyaan, laba isbuuc ka hor.

headlines.headline: Hillary Clinton oo noqotay musharaxa xisbiga Dimuqraadiga

items.summary: Hillary Clinton waxa ay aqbashay in ay noqoto musharraxa xisbiga Dimuquraadiga ee doorashada madaxweynaha ee soo socta.

items.summary: Wararka ka imaanaya degmada Rabdhuure ee gobolka Bakool, ayaa sheegaya in dagaalyahanno ka tirsan Al-Shabaab ay qabsadeen degmadaasi, ka dib markii ay isaga baxeen ciidammada Itoobiya iyo kuwa dawladda oo halkaasi gacanta ku hayay labadii sano ee ugu danbeysay.
